abstract: The clashes on Sunday in the Tunisian capital were an example of religiously based violence that has picked up just before the country is set to hold elections.
snippet: The clashes on Sunday in the Tunisian capital were an example of religiously based violence that has picked up just before the country is set to hold elections.
lead_paragraph: Riot police clashed with large numbers of Islamist protesters on Sunday in the Tunisian capital in a spasm of religiously based violence that stemmed, in part, from the television broadcast of an animated movie that is critical of the Iranian revolution.

headline.main: Tunisian Islamists Riot Over Animated Film About Iran
